messages.messageBody:
lol...reminds me of Laurie's suggestion when she was younger (I've
talked about writing this book for years)

Her suggestion... School Sucks


Valerie


--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "Betsy Hill" <ecsamhill@e...> wrote:
> >I tried to be tactful in the book too. I made a point of saying
that
> >I was not trying to bash schools but to raise awareness that
school
> >was not necessary to lead a successful happy life.
>
> I like "Who Needs School?" as a startling, slap-in-the-face title.
>
> Subtitle: Not You, or Your Children
>
> Betsy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: College bound Question/ For Valerie  and All
messages.msgSnippet: ... I like Who Needs School? as a startling, slap-in-the-face title. Subtitle: Not You, or Your Children Betsy
messages.messageBody:
>I tried to be tactful in the book too. I made a point of saying that
>I was not trying to bash schools but to raise awareness that school
>was not necessary to lead a successful happy life.

I like "Who Needs School?" as a startling, slap-in-the-face title.

Subtitle: Not You, or Your Children

Betsy
